When dealing damage with an attack, the damage will be reduced depending on the stat that increased the damage and the respective defensive stat of your target.

Attacks made stronger by your atk stat are reduced by an enemy's def stat
Attacks made stronger by your spatk stat are reduced by an enemy's spdef stat

When in combat, you can determine a fighter's higher defensive stat by looking at the color of their health bar

ðŸŸª = spdef is higher
ðŸŸ« = def is higher
ðŸŸ© = both stats are relatively the same

Check your abilities by clicking the 'Non-ability Actions' dropdown and selecting 'View Fighter' and then use this knowledge to defeat the practice dummies in less than 3 turns
soulless_cat used **Basic Physical Attack** on Practice Dummy #1
